statements: CREATE TABLE HumanitarianAid (id INT PRIMARY KEY, organization_name STRING, donation_amount DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE beneficiaries (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), age INT, address VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE donations (donation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, donor_name VARCHAR(255), amount DECIMAL(10,2), donation_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE organizations (org_id INT PRIMARY KEY, org_name TEXT, org_type TEXT)
CREATE TABLE employees (emp_id INT PRIMARY KEY, emp_name TEXT, emp_email TEXT, org_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (org_id) REFERENCES organizations(org_id))
CREATE TABLE departments (dept_id INT PRIMARY KEY, dept_name TEXT, org_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (org_id) REFERENCES organizations(org_id))
CREATE TABLE aid_agencies (agency_id INT, agency_name VARCHAR(255), country VARCHAR(100), PRIMARY KEY (agency_id);
CREATE TABLE aid_workers (worker_id INT, worker_name VARCHAR(255), skills VARCHAR(255), agency_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (worker_id), FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES aid_agencies(agency_id);

CREATE TABLE aid_requests (request_id INT, request_date DATE, requester_name VARCHAR(255), request_description TEXT, worker_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (request_id), FOREIGN KEY (worker_id) REFERENCES aid_workers(worker_id);
CREATE TABLE aid_deliveries (delivery_id INT, delivery_date DATE, request_id INT, delivered_quantity INT, PRIMARY KEY (delivery_id), FOREIGN KEY (request_id) REFERENCES aid_requests(request_id);

CREATE TABLE example_table2 (
  example_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  example_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  example_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  example_org_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (example_org_id) REFERENCES example_organization(example_org_id)
);

CREATE TABLE example_table3 (
  example_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  example_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  example_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  example_vol_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (example_vol_id) REFERENCES example_volunteers(example_vol_id)
);
